ing: 2 large seedless English cucumbers, sliced thin
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Great salad to make when you have a ton of cucumbers coming out of the garden. We make this year round but we are real cuke lovers in this family. Let it sit for a few days in the fridge and it's even better! Great make-ahead dish for BBQs and parties."
ins:
Lightly toss cucumber slices, onion slices, and chopped dill together in a large bowl.
Pour vinegar over cucumber mixture; toss to coat.
Pour oil over cucumber mixture; toss to coat.
Season with salt and black pepper.
